resources.string: [a]Home[/a] Depending on [i]Question Style[/i], we speak the question or print it in first coloured field (blue for English, red for Spanish); 2nd field is a hint if relevant; 3rd field is for the answer; type in the answer and we will mark it, or press Go with the answer field blank, and we will let you mark it yourself.\n \n Using [i]Question Style[/i] you can choose Spanish-to-English or English-to-Spanish; the question can be printed or spoken; normally we mark our own answers (to save fiddling with small keyboards) but if you want to check your spelling you can type in the answer. If you want to check your Spanish pronunciation and you have Wi-Fi, you can speak the answer and we will use Google speech recognition to try to decipher what you are saying.

[b]Â¡Bienvenida! Welcome![/b]\n Left swipe from side of screen to see main menu; long press on a button to show tip. Spanish has several words for [i]you[/i]; to differentiate in English we use [i]thou[/i] for the familiar, and [i]YOU[/i] for the plural.\n Help Topics: [a]Main[/a], [a]NumbersGame[/a], [a]WordLookup[/a]. If you have any comments or suggestions for improving this app, please send an email to amazemequiz@gmail.com

[a]Home[/a] Listen to the numbers spoken in Spanish, and type in that number; if you get the number correct, your blue man will move forward; if the red man reaches the end before you, you have lost; if you get to the end before him, you go back to the beginning at the next level, where the red man gets slightly faster, and the questions get slightly harder. If you get caught, you can still continue to answer questions, but you will stay at the same level.

[a]Home[/a] Type in a word, either Spanish or English, and press [i]Go[/i] on the soft keyboard. If the word is a verb, the full conjugation will be shown; otherwise we show the definition of that word from the dictionary. Press [i]back[/i] button to return to the main screen, or swipe in from the left for the main menu.
[a]Home[/a] Number of words you got wrong at this level or carried over from previous levels

[a]Home[/a] The question is as shown in the top coloured line. Think of your answer (if the required answer is Spanish, ideally speak it aloud) and press Go and we will fill in the correct answer; you can then tell us if you got it right or not. Note: if you want to skip a word, just pretend you got it right! Alternatively type in your answer and press Go, and we will mark it for you. Self mark mode only works if the answer is blank.
[a]Home[/a] Press if your mental guess was wrong; this word will be added to your list of failed words
[a]Home[/a] Allows you to speak the answer; requires internet connection
[a]Home[/a] Restart the game, 2 levels below current
[a]Home[/a] Listen to the current Spanish word
[a]Home[/a]Press if your mental guess was correct, or you want to skip this word; it will not be added to your list of failed words
